name: 2022 International Conference on Public Culture and Social Services
content: To adapt to this changing world and China' s fast development in this new era, 2022 International Conference on Public Culture and Society Services (PCSS 2022) will be held on August 19-21, 2022 in Dalian, China. This conference takes "bringing together global wisdom in scientific innovation to promote high-quality development" as the theme and focuses on cutting-edge research fields including Public Culture and Society Service. The primary goal of the conference is to promote research and developmental activities in related field. We warmly invite you to participate in PCSS 2022 and look forward to seeing you in Dalian.
